website_summaries.verdict: The type of floating desk you should pick when you want something that is out of the way in a large open room or space in a home or apartment.
pros: Supports are extremely effective at securing the desk to the wall
Great for extra peace of mind when using the desk
cons: Desk space is more limited than a more traditional office desk

customer_reviews.title: Really nice low profile desk
customer_reviews.text: I really love this desk. I was looking for something small to put into a guest bedroom and this works perfectly. There is enough room for dual 27" monitors, my laptop in the open drawer, keyboard, mouse, and a small writing area. To make the laptop work, I did have to add a hole through the back to facilitate cord management.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Solin

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the panels/laminate and the hardware that was included. Is it perfect? No. However, at this price point I think it's a great value. The assembly was relatively easy and well-designed. Most of the panels are particle board while the horizontal surfaces (worktop and bottom panel) are MDF. I purchased this with the matching hutch and they make a great combo. My only complaint is that there is very little give for horizontal movement on the cleat (about 1/4"). In my case I had to cut down a receptacle wallplate because I could not move the desk an additional 1/4". Overall still happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: stuball

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This desk is amazing! Such a cool way to do a small closet office like mine. Took my husband a few tries to get the mounting right and the instructions were a nightmare when it came to putting it together but it’s great when it’s finally done.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: MADE TO ORDER
customer_reviews.text: The counter desk blends in perfectly in my kitchen. It provides me with extra counter space for making the kids' lunches and snacks. I am absolutely thrilled with the design and craftmanship of the item. In fact I may get another one for my laundry room where it would be perfect for folding laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful looking desk
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk, this was my first floating desk & I love it! I live in a small house, so I really liked how it is a space-saver too. The look of it is lovely. The only problem I had with it was that the directions were a bit hard to follow, but my husband put it together just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great for work and a vanity.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk to double as a workspace and makeup vanity. I did the installation 100% myself but I can see how having two people would cut down on time. I also hung it higher than the guidelines said. I wanted a bar-height chair and desk so my son couldn’t reach my expensive stuff anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Hynes

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality and easy to set-up. My 14-year-old and I assembled in about 60 minutes. Durable. Sturdy. Saves on space, particularly in a bedroom where space is at a premium.
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY T FOURIER

customer_reviews.title: Great Makeup Vanity
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my traditional makeup vanity with this Designer Floating desk in White. Very clean lines. Very sturdy and is perfect for hiding my plugs for my blow dryer, makeup mirror and straightener. I bought clear acrylic organizational trays that fit perfectly into the three openings. I store all my makeup, tools and brushes, creams, lotions, perfume, and everything I need hidden in the openings and it stays clean and hidden. Great way to organize all your stuff and get rid of the unsightly clutter on top of your vanity. The laminate material wipes off easily if anything gets on it. My vanity bench seat fits great underneath and cleaning underneath is so easy without the traditional legs. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Mehrer

customer_reviews.title: Examine for damage prior to assembly.  Otherwise, functional and sleek looking.
customer_reviews.text: I do like this desk, but had to laugh at the shipping info which states that it is "Drop Shipped" because it arrived with two damaged corners. Maybe they took literally their shipping instructions. I needed the desk immediately so I installed with damaged corners and all. Just covered with a little white paint. I installed this desk as a standing desk. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom who cares

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but...
customer_reviews.text: Instructions very easy to follow, used a drill in low setting to make it go quicker without any problems. Once assembled, attaching mounting bracket to studs could have been easier if allen wrench bolts that came with desk to secure on studs weren't so crappy. Had to go to HD to buy better ones. Besides that minor defect, it looks really nice. Ohh, forgot to mention that the first desk that arrived was damaged but Amazon sent another very quick with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: ANDRES

customer_reviews.title: Love these desks!
customer_reviews.text: Paid a handyman to assemble so I can't speak to ease of assembly but I love them (and so do the girls)! Had to go with floating desk because our 14 year old is 5'11 so these are mounted at counter height to give her lots of leg room. Still searching for cute chairs (drafting or counter height). I love that we can put storage underneath the desks, the built-in storage and the nook for cords. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but a bit tricky to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the finished product but it’s definitely a bit challenging to assemble - gets easier as you go. Need two people to make it happen. Took us about 4 hours in total. Amazing desk though and totally opened up my space! I paired it with three floating shelves I got off amazon too and a bulletin board and it all goes together super nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Back

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I like the color. Its almost black-brown with darkgray ashlike colors. Install was simple against an exterior wall. It has been up for over 3 months now with daily use. No issues. I would recommend lowering the height 1"-2" since there is no keyboard drawer. Not sure what to put in the nooks under the flat top. They just collect dust. My problem was cabling in my surge protectors.When I added them, I discovered that the hole to run the power cord wasn't big enough. I had to loosen everything push it through then tigtighten it up. I would recommend doing this while you build the furniture before it gets on the wall...uggh!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Stansell

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing ! All wires are hidden in Compartment. I highly recommend !
customer_reviews.text: This desk and hutch combo looks amazing ! Very modern ! All wires are neatly hidden in compartment ! It was very easy to put together, the only problem is that none of the boards were labeled. However if you look at the pictures in the directions and use a little common sense, you'll put it together in no time. Hanging the desk and hutch on the wall was a breeze and it looks amazing, will be taking pics and posting them later if that's allowed. I highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: G_Tech

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small spaces. It's very sturdy and easy to assemble. I am a petite woman and I had no difficulties assembling and mounting it on the wall. It's great quality and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jack & Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Loge the floatdesk
customer_reviews.text: Today i finally had a chance to setup this desk and let me tell you i was going to rate this a 5 star but the shipping box that this item comes in sucks everything move in the box they need to have better box for this to go in the first one they sent was damage due to the box. The quality of the desk is amazing the lock screws are great it help the desk to stay solid love it because it float and look great and modern i have my computer on it and looks the best everyone ask me where i got that
customer_reviews.author: the zone

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just seeing the box alone made me nervous because it looked like someone took it and threw it around in the back of the UPS truck. Then the instructions are TERRIBLE. Nothing comes marked as to what is what. And then to top it off, I see the damage to it. (See photos) Save your time, energy, frustration and money and just buy something already made. (Found one at Target that is even nicer and doesn't require an entire book to assemble it.) Total ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: Bretina

customer_reviews.title: Great Floating Desk, Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what i was looking for, 100% happy with the design and ease of install. You will need a few hours at most for this and a few more tools than the instructions call for. I used an impact drill to install the support bracket with 4 inch lag bolts and mechanics socket set. Those alan screws that come included are weak and murder on your fingers. Finding at least one wall stud is absolutely critical, without it this desk will come down, Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love This Desk
customer_reviews.text: One of my grand daughters wanted this for Christmas. Though it was a little difficult to put together and put up. It was worth it. The desk is solid. Looks great in her room. Great quality. She loves it !!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Brinson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible instructional
customer_reviews.text: Terrible written instructions. Missing several important steps. The product is nice once you figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is pretty simple, but mounting not so much
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is pretty simple, but mounting not so much. Definitely need two people. I have metal studs that are 24 inches apart, so I wound up using 3 heavy duty 100lb+ drywall anchors. Pretty sure it's not going anywhere. I gave 4 stars instead of 5 because the desk is not quite black. It has a slight brown tone that I don't believe was represented in the photos
customer_reviews.author: Cat W

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I love this desk. Very easy to put together just follow the instructions. There very simple instructions that show you pictures on how to do it. Very sturdy! Most importantly, make you screw into the studs!! I love it I love it and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Walker

customer_reviews.title: I installed a big wall mirror on top of it and it is perfect! My daughter loves it and it fits perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a vanity for my 15 years old daughter. I installed a big wall mirror on top of it and it is perfect! My daughter loves it and it fits perfectly in her small room. You do have to locate the studs to hang the desk so it might not end up in the exact place you want it but we made it work
customer_reviews.author: rosalinda lam

customer_reviews.title: Great desk!
customer_reviews.text: Great desk!! Instructions were clear enough. A bit tedious putting together but the biggest difficulty was hanging it on the brace on the wall without a second pair of hands helping. This desk makes the room look neater, great item.
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs E

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for my wall but stunning.
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy for my wall fell twice lol but I loved it for the few minutes that it stayed on my wall. If you have a handy man that knows how to hang properly props. Would've definitely kept if it stayed up.
customer_reviews.author: CheMayris

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we expected and more.
customer_reviews.text: the product provides exactly what we anticipated and have been using it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Glen McClure

customer_reviews.title: Desk is good looking and functional
customer_reviews.text: Desk is good looking and functional. It is made with a lot of press/particle board however it seems to be holding up. I like the compartment in the back of the desk to hide your cables very nice. Also great feature is once you assemble the unit (1.5 hours) you mount provided steel bar to wall and hang desk on bar. This makes hanging the desk simple and easy just make sure wall is strait as it is pretty tight. You will definitely need two people to hang it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Holly S.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item
customer_reviews.text: Box was damaged and when we opened to put the desk together the right part of desk was damaged. Very disappointed it arrived in such poor shape as it was a Christmas present for our daughter
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Manning

customer_reviews.title: Yes, buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk, was not bad at all to assemble. My husband and I did this in just a little over an hour. that includes finding the studs and mounting the bracket for it to rest on. So much easier to clean under the desk and the dogs love that they can lay under the desk while we are on the computer. Very nice troth for all the wires to be out of sight. Clean and neat work area.
customer_reviews.author: Retta24

customer_reviews.title: Missing a hardware for assembly
customer_reviews.text: I like the desk well enough. It is reasonable sturdy. It was missing one one of the speciality hardware pieces for assembly, so not something that I had just laying around the garage. Missing hardware is not quality.
customer_reviews.author: trina park

customer_reviews.title: very compact and useful for us
customer_reviews.text: very compact and useful for us. I put it in my unused fourth bedroom, My kids use it as a place to get away to study when other areas in the house are noisy. After almost a year, the white top has minimal wear but still looks good. Just be careful when measuring for where the outlet is. The directions are not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Modern furniture
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk for my daughter's room. Her old desk was right against the radiator. This desk frees up space for the heat to flow freely. Love the modern and space saving design. The cord access holes are great too
customer_reviews.author: Sfield541

customer_reviews.title: Floating Desk
customer_reviews.text: Many compliments regarding this desk. Love it. Serves it's purpose for a paperless work environment yet roomy enough for dual monitors, notes, key board, mouse, and a few other materials.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and cute. Ended up mounting it a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and cute. Ended up mounting it a bit higher so I can use it as a standing desk or with a high/bar chair if I prefer to sit.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana F.

customer_reviews.title: Mounts to the wall pretty securely and the rear compartment hides the cables
customer_reviews.text: I wish the cable management was centralized and not on both the left and the right. It throws off things as I'm used to central cable management. Otherwise, it does what was expected of it. Mounts to the wall pretty securely and the rear compartment hides the cables.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni M.

customer_reviews.title: Modern space-saving desk for tiny rooms
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, sturdy, and a little terrible to install unless you're very familiar with tools and have a large level on hand. But now it's on the wall, by golly, and I quite like it. I installed at standing desk height, and I really like how much floor space is saved by the "floating" design. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: urbanite

customer_reviews.title: Poor service
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were hard to understand. If the parts had labels it would make it easier and faster to assemble. ALSO, they forgot to include the nails and the mount so I had to call and wait another week and a half to get the mount . Pain in the but
customer_reviews.author: Ana castillo

customer_reviews.title: they are a really good buy and pretty functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and they are still standing after 7 months.... they are a really good buy and pretty functional. I wish the drawer space was a little bit bigger but other than that they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: insomniac writers

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised to see just how sturdy and well designed this desk is
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly well constructed. My wife wanted this as her work desk at home and I was expecting particle board and cheap hardware. I was surprised to see just how sturdy and well designed this desk is. We have since added the matching cabinet and TV entertainment center.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: The only problem was that the pieces were not labeled as like the manual showed.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and rock solid. Initially, I was a little sceptical and thought it wouldn't be able to stand the test of time. Ive had mine now for several months and I use it all day, every week day, since I work from home. Its held up perfectly and is as solid today as the day I installed it. Love the look and space it saves.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small desk
customer_reviews.text: I got it to do work on it and to keep my 17'' laptop on. The desk works perfectly for a small room. The only down fall, for me,is where the cords go down, it is one one solid piece of wood. I think for me it would be better if it was two pieces because I use the left side for wires and don't use the right. However best floating desk for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler Voege

customer_reviews.title: MIssing / broken parts
customer_reviews.text: Opened box to start putting this together. The first thing missing was the instruction book. I was able to reach customer service and get an instruction book emailed to me. Starting putting this together. The first piece on the instruction page was missing from the box. The second piece was damaged. Called customer service back, they are sending replacements but it will take another 5 days to get here. If I could find something locally to use for a computer desk I would send this back, but I'll wait and see if the pieces come and see what other pieces are missing once I start putting this together.
customer_reviews.author: sarah price

customer_reviews.title: Weak scews
customer_reviews.text: I give this shelf almost 4 stars.The screws that came with the items were very cheap and they were stripped when screwed into the wall. We ended up buying our own screws for safer installation. It looks great on the wall but be sure not to put too much weight on the desk.
customer_reviews.author: jamie davis

customer_reviews.title: Expectations Exceeded!
customer_reviews.text: The desk exceeded our expectations. It was easy to assemble and it is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: RenMor

customer_reviews.title: Great desk, for small area
customer_reviews.text: We love this desk. We were trying to make an office double as a guest room and this desk is the perfect size to use as a desk or a vanity. It fits perfect in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful desk!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful desk it’s perfect doesn’t take up so much space.
customer_reviews.author: Iris C.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This desk was just what my small office room needed. It takes a little while to put together and having a helping hand to hold some pieces in place while assembling is advised. It is very well built and was easy to mount on the wall. Stylish and not too imposing in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Desk itself is good and I think it is a good design product
customer_reviews.text: Desk itself is good and I think it is a good design product, if the hardware would have better quality, I definitely would give 5 stars. Overall I would recommend this desk if you look for a desk for small place.
customer_reviews.author: DSF

customer_reviews.title: great desk would buy again
customer_reviews.text: installed at my office finally... bought months ago... looks great on the space.. like that it float and takes no floor space and the little back hide away keeps all the cords out of the way... nice addition
customer_reviews.author: Pwildcon

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I realy like this thing, I would have given it five stars if the mounting system was better and if it didnt scratch so easy.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: using it now had to complete flooring before I installed my desks love em have 2
customer_reviews.author: nankim

customer_reviews.title: dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: It came cracked. So disappointing considering they are now sold out. And im stuck using a cracked product. And no other options. 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla seay

customer_reviews.title: Nice nice nice...
customer_reviews.text: It was fun to put it together... works so well on the wall... looks quite nice too... easy to clean the floor with a table like that...
customer_reviews.author: Wenjing

customer_reviews.title: Great desk that does not hog space.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent desk. Shipped fast and really cleans up office space. Large front cube holds full size sketch books along with keyboard when not in use. Will need very small UPS if you plan to keep it in hinged portion. Also suggest getting some type of desk protector to avoid scratches in finish.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great desk. Saves a ton of space and makes good use of its real estate.
customer_reviews.author: Guy named George or Bob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: It’s not too big and not too small, it’s the perfect size and very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Hind abdelwhab

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and tidy!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the instructions were terrible (the only reason for 4 stars). But, rating the product, it is exactly as described. I love having the floor clear for easy cleaning and the wires all tucked away in the back compartment. Plenty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: W. Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Great for work/ gaming
customer_reviews.text: Easy one man set up. Great for work/ gaming on a laptop. Decent cable management system.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was not really easy to assemble, but manageable. Hanging, however, was anything but easy. The desk looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Dame of Belair

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great desk. Installation was a bit tricky but ended up looking perfect. Sturdy and quality is impeccable.
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Desk, Easy Construction
customer_reviews.text: Received two for Christmas. One had a little damage on it but it wasn't noticeable when put together, so not a problem at all. They are easy to put together if you have any sense at all. I put two of them together in under 2 hours. Not hard at all. Very good product and looks good when mounted.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wanderski

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk
customer_reviews.text: Few nicks but not too bad really easy to install and exactly as shown
customer_reviews.author: Jaybird 78

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Easy to hang on the wall too. Love the storage space for the cords.
customer_reviews.author: Mayleen

customer_reviews.title: great quality NOT CHEAP LOOKING AT
customer_reviews.text: very classy looking in our small office, great quality NOT CHEAP LOOKING AT ALL
customer_reviews.author: Alicia B. Navarrete

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece, way better than a table that sits on legs. And the cubby hole in the back rocks
customer_reviews.author: Woot City

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me.just large enough to make me stay organized.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: so awsome for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We just love this in our kitchen. It installed easy and looks do modern and is very functional, I can't belive I found this on amazon online. It really wad a score!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: My newborn son took over my office. Love the desk, it works perfect for my needs. Looks great good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lutter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is modern. Does not Take up the space that a traditional desk requires and looked exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: mschum

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this desk for my daughter's room to try and open up her space more and the desk fit and looks great! I even painted the desk to match the color scheme in her room. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jordana Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I did lean on it a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, I love it. I did lean on it a bit too much and it fell down but no damage was done and I hung it right back up!
customer_reviews.author: Katlynn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great desk saves floor space. Drilled hole for computer cords and worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: john hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: One corner of the desk is damaged but not worth dealing with returning - overall nice desk and wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: Johan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk was exactly as described and easy to put together. My wife loved it.
customer_reviews.author: JoAlex

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS DESK
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this desk. It's very stylish. It attaches to the wall so you have more floor space. Easy vacuuming. I bought a beautiful ottoman with storage that works perfectly with it and slides right underneath. Has a flip up door at the back to conceal wires. I use this desk for my laptop and makeup mirror. You can position it at any height you like. Great desk at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Redeemed

customer_reviews.title: good product but has issues
customer_reviews.text: the directions had no directions this is the 2nd product from the same company , only get pictures this was a little more complex to figure out. mounting bolt twisted in half when we tried to mount the mounting bracket. Good thing I was prepared same thing happened last time when I got something from these guys.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and space saving
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, easy to assemble and perfect for smaller spaces where room is a priority. Plenty of desk top space as well.
customer_reviews.author: Travis V.

customer_reviews.title: Bought the hutch too and they are both perfect! The only problem is that it's hanging with ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited about this desk! Bought the hutch too and they are both perfect! The only problem is that it's hanging with 2 screws instead of 3 because it came with 1 screw missing, so we'll see how sturdy it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Squier

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this desk. It's stylish and plenty big and so out of the way. Easy and quick to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk for Small Spaces
customer_reviews.text: This desk looks GREAT hanging on my wall, and installation was a breeze. Its very sturdy, and spacious for such a small desk, which includes a hidden back area for power bricks and cords. The desk did come with a tiny blemish on the front left corner of the top slab, which is the only reason its receiving 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: PleaseProvideAPenName

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little narrow but we knew it would be. otherwise..working out well.
customer_reviews.author: Carol G.

customer_reviews.title: ... out the Nuts had to go to Home depo perfect for the
customer_reviews.text: came with out the Nuts had to go to Home depo perfect for the space
customer_reviews.author: Chynn

customer_reviews.title: fits together real nice
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality and the instructions were really good. I had it together in about 30 minutes. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: L. DONOVAN

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Daughter's room
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the desk & it installed easily. There were a couple screws missing from the package, but I had some that fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: errrik89

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and that it takes up no floor space. Wish the screws where better as i stripped the head with allen wrench. Also needed to drill holes in one piece that was over looked. .
customer_reviews.author: HEb

customer_reviews.title: Ordered one for Christmas and was very happy it can on tome with no damages and was ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one for Christmas and was very happy it can on tome with no damages and was perfect for my son's bedroom, Thanks AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Lacefield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very functional. It takes up less space than a refusal desk. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H.

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This item is very very heavy and difficult to install.
customer_reviews.author: Lusia

customer_reviews.title: Fell while I was sitting at the desk.
customer_reviews.text: Quite literally fell off the wall within a week. Installed exactly as instructed. If I could give it 0 stars, I would. Will have to pay to get my walls patched. Amazon customer service was great with the return.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

product_meta.title: Wall Mounted Designer Floating Desk in Washed Ebony
product_meta.description: Optimize your space with Prepac's Designer Floating Desk. Perfectly suited for any home office, den, living room, kitchen or bedroom. The stable work surface is ideal for any computer or simply as a place to get your work done. A rear "flip-up" door conceals a storage compartment that is ideal for power bars and adapters. No more messy wires cluttering up your workspace! Installation is a breeze for this wall mounted desk with Prepac's innovative hanging rail system. Proudly manufactured in Canada using CARB-compliant, laminated composite wood. Ships Ready to Assemble, includes an instruction booklet for easy assembly and has a 5-year manufacturer's limited warranty.
